Gremlins JS

Monkey testing with Javascript

So for a for a Dev Monday project ( Every second Monday at my work Developers can work on a project they think will benefit the company and tech stack. ) I decided to test the Angular Js application had been working on using Gremlins.js. This library will test your UI for error's by generating random user input and collecting the results.

Below I will document my journey.

So I am starting off by including gremlins.js as a dependancy of my project. We are using Yarn so:
